step.title: Prepare for transportation by land, sea or air

paragraph.prodType: Cell | Damaged cell | Module | Damaged module | Pack | Damaged pack
paragraph.htmltext:
During the preparationt for transportation the cells, modules and packs are packed and labeled according to the regulation applicable for the type of transport:

  • ADR regulation for road transport
  • IMDG regulation for sea trasport
  • IATA regulation for air transport

Each regulation defines the type of packaging, the labeling and the needed transportation documents.
